question_content.description:
### Problem17


The binary search follows the recursive strategy:

- Base case: If hi - lo equals 1, then the secret number is _____(0)\___ (hi/mid/lo).
- Reduction step : Otherwise, ask whether the secret number is greater than or equal to the number mid = lo + ( hi - lo )/2. If so, look for the number in [_____(1)\___, _____(2)\___] (hi/mid/lo); if not, look for the number in [_____(3)\___ , _____(4)\___] (hi/mid/lo).
question_content.author: Yantao_Mei
